original_title: Spice Girls: Girl Power! Live in Istanbul
overview: Join the Spice Girls live in Istanbul for their first ever concert! Plus: GIRLS TALK! An exclusive interview with the Girls! Find out what it's really, really like to be a Spice Girl!
tagline: GIRL POWER - LIVE! SHARE THE VIBE! CHOOSE LIFE, CHOOSE SPICE!
title: Girl Power! Live in Istanbul
